actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to continue the medicare reimbursement waivers for certain hospitals subject to regional hospital reimbursement demonstrations.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for the continuation of certain State hospital reimbursement control systems in effect on January 1, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to continue the medicare reimbursement waivers for certain hospitals subject to regional hospital reimbursement demonstrations.
